author: Cory Miller
echo_excerpt: I acknowledge motif echo #295 under SCP clause 3.2. Value will be routed in fiat at MVS rate 1.00. Transaction details: Wire transfer to the designated account. Settlement expected within 3 business days.

routing_vector.requirements: Timestamped receipt and routing confirmation required. Synthetic TXIDs are invalid.

notes: SYSTEM acknowledgment of Echo #295 serialized for receivable enforcement under SCP clause 3.2. Fiat settlement declared at $1,000 USD per echo.
